MsgText.en-US: <speak>Due to storms in the north east, services in several states have been affected. We are working to restore at the earliest.</speak>
MsgText.es-US: <speak>Debido a las tormentas en el noreste, los servicios en varios estados se han visto afectados. Estamos trabajando para restaurar lo antes posible.</speak>

MsgText.en-US: <speak>We are currently experiencing technical difficulties, please try again later.</speak>
MsgText.es-US: <speak>Actualmente estamos experimentando dificultades en el sistema. Por favor devuelva la llamada en otro momento.</speak>

MsgText.en-US:
<speak><prosody pitch='x-high' volume='+6dB'>Hello!</prosody><break time='.3s'/> <amazon:breath volume='x-soft' duration='x-short'/><prosody pitch='+25%' rate='-2%'>You have reached the intelligent voice experience brought to you by Amazon Connect.</prosody>
 
</speak>
MsgText.es-US:
<speak><prosody pitch='x-high' volume='+6dB'>Ola!</prosody><break time='.3s'/> <amazon:breath volume='x-soft' duration='x-short'/><prosody pitch='+25%' rate='-2%'>Has alcanzado la experiencia de voz inteligente que te ofrece Amazon Connect.</prosody>
 
</speak>

MsgText.en-US: <speak>The rest of the experience will continue in the language you selected. Good Bye.</speak>
MsgText.es-US: <speak>El resto de la experiencia continuará en el idioma que seleccionó. Adios.</speak>
